dsOverview.title: CDROMs of Northern Hemisphere Gridded Analyses, 1946-1994Dec

summary.p: Version III CD-ROMs include twice daily analyses from 1946 through December 1994. Selected daily grids (not on CD-ROMs) of 1995-2009 are now available as of 2010JAN28.
